TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualStyleElement/Header/SortArrow extends System.Object
public: ref class VisualStyleElement::Header::SortArrow abstract sealed

Docs.summary: Provides objects for the sort arrow of a header item. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Each property of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.SortArrow> class gets a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> for the sort arrow of a header item.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer> with the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.SortArrow.SortedDown%2A> property. To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementHeaderSortArrow2` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.
[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#176](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/CS/Form1.cs#176)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples#176](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyleElementsExamples/VB/Form1.vb#176)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SortedDown As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents a downward-pointing sort arrow.
Docs.value: A that represents a downward-pointing sort arrow.

remarks.format:
## Remarks You can use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> returned by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Header.SortArrow.SortedDown%2A> property to create a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleRenderer>.

To run this example, paste it into a Windows Form. Handle the form's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event and call the `DrawVisualStyleElementHeaderSortArrow2` method from the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Control.Paint> event-handling method, passing `e` as <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs>.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SortedUp As VisualStyleElement

Docs.summary: Gets a visual style element that represents an upward-pointing sort arrow.
Docs.value: A that represents an upward-pointing sort arrow.

remarks.format:
